title: Schenadüi
text: The Schenadüi is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, located in the Swiss canton of <a href="Ticino">Ticino</a>. It lies between the valleys of Piora and Cadlimo and on the main Alpine watershed between the basin of the <a href="Rhine">Rhine</a> and that of the <a href="Ticino%20%28river%29">Ticino</a>.
